Rocket-Vue Example

This demonstrates Heisenberg's Rocket adapter functionality.

Features Demonstrated:

  • Rocket adapter integration
  • API routes served by Rust backend
  • Static frontend served by Heisenberg
  • Dual-mode operation (dev/prod)

Rocket vs Axum:

  • Rocket runs on port 8000 (default)
  • Uses Rocket's routing and JSON macros
  • Different adapter implementation
